# supportedColorSpaces

**Instance Property**

The list of the device’s supported color spaces.

## Declaration

```swift
@nonobjc var supportedColorSpaces: [AVCaptureColorSpace] { get }
```

## Determining color support

- **isGlobalToneMappingSupported**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the format supports global tone mapping.
